text: A Man Called Peter is a 1955 American drama movie directed by Henry Koster and was adapted from the 1951 biography of the same name by Catherine Marshall. It stars Richard Todd, Jean Peters, Marjorie Rambeau, Jill Esmond, Les Tremayne, Richard Garrick, Gladys Hurlbut and was distributed by 20th Century Fox. It was nominated for an Academy Award in 1956. == Other websites == * Category:1955 drama movies Category:American drama movies Category:20th Century Fox movies Category:Movies directed by Henry Koster
title: A Man Called Peter
